channel.title: I knew it was time to leave when...
channel.description: Ben Hill has posted an amusing entry analysing desk clutter. This lead me to think about previous jobs and why I have left. Ask yourself this little question:- Q. "I knew it was time to leave when..." A. My IDE...
channel.dc:creator: Martin

item.title: Comment by Anon+00:00
item.description: The name on the front of the door changed three times in a year
